ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot

Interface Scatterplot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TwoDimensionalPlot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Scatterplot, Scatterplot

    public interface Scatterplot
extends TwoDimensionalPlot
    A two-dimensional plot with (x,y) data points that can be joined by line segments.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.TwoDimensionalPlot

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Scatterplot withLines()
      Tells the plot to draw each data series with lines between each data point

      Tells whether to draw each data series with lines between each data point
      Scatterplot withPoints()
      Tells the plot to draw each data series with a mark for each data point

      Tells whether to draw each data series with a mark for each data point
